function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of neighborhood social capital limits access to healthcare and information, contributing to disease factors and exacerbating stress.","Impact":"Deterioration in infrastructure, disinvestment, and increased stress, leading to worsened disease outcomes.","Mitigation":"Investment in building neighborhood social capital, improving access to healthcare and information, and addressing environmental triggers.","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, telemedicine, and environmental monitoring systems.","People":"Families in neighborhoods with low social capital.","Owner":"Community organizations, healthcare providers, and local government."},{"Description":"Discovery of virus with genomic similarity to SARS-CoV-2 raises concerns about potential for human transmission.","Impact":"Risk of potential outbreak and spread of disease from virus with high genomic similarity to SARS-CoV-2.","Mitigation":"Increase surveillance and monitoring of zoonotic diseases, research on potential transmission pathways, and development of preventive measures.","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, disease surveillance systems, and zoonotic disease research tools.","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, and healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, and public health organizations."}]}
